description: In my role as a Full-stack Developer at State of the Art, I led the migration of WordPress websites to SvelteKit and Headless CMS solutions, resulting in improved performance and maintainability. I also designed and developed a custom CMS (Mercury) using Rust, showcasing my advanced programming skills. Additionally, I collaborated closely with clients to conceptualise and execute diverse web projects, ensuring a cohesive digital presence for clients.

As a marketing professional with a passion for coding, I exceled in developing web applications using HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, SvelteKit, and Node.js. I successfully managed and optimised SEO and WordPress pages, while also leveraging my skills in graphic design, videography, and photography to create engaging content. My technical expertise, combined with my experience in project management, allowed me to deliver high-quality results in a fast-paced environment.

As a leader, I provided comprehensive staff training to ensure a high level of service excellence and product knowledge, resulting in improved customer satisfaction and repeat business. I effectively managed ordering and monitoring of stock, maintaining optimal inventory levels while minimizing waste and adhering to budgetary constraints. My ability to lead and motivate a team of staff, fostering a positive work environment and providing constructive feedback, enhanced overall performance and productivity.

I was responsible for maintaining and updating the company's WordPress website to ensure current content and optimal performance. I also managed email marketing campaigns to improve customer engagement and reach. Additionally, I produced videos for social media and TV advertising to enhance brand visibility across platforms.
